title: Collectibles (cryptokitties) are not being loaded for the very first time (spinner and blank screen)
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: Blank screen and spinner shown when I am trying to view collectibles for the very first time in wallet

#### Expected behavior
Collectibles are shown (all cryptokittes) 

#### Actual behavior
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/43199891-2415cec0-901c-11e8-82ae-8fea8054c4f7.png)

### Reproduction

NOTE: you will be able to load your kitties after relogin 

- Open Status
- Recover account with cryptokitties
- Go to wallet and enable CK
- Tap CryptoKitties collectible section in order to view all your kitties

#### Logs


Looks good to me on iOS12, Android 6.0.1 and Android 7 with Develop 0.9.29: 
20 cryptokitty items load fast enough on the very first load of it's list in Wallet
